verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> to pass, when Solomon<WH8010> had finished<WH3615> the building<WH1129> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> and the king's<WH4428> house,<WH1004> and all<WH3605> Solomon's<WH8010> desire<WH2837> which<WH834> he was pleased<WH2654> to do,<WH6213>
